DESCRIPTION

LEJO is an independent youth organisation, engaged within the policy fields of Youthwork and Education & Training, located in Ghent, Belgium. The NGO LEJO stands for 'Learning by Experience with Youngsters' A growing number of young people are having difficulties finding their way in our increasingly more individualized and demanding society. This project wants to empower youngsters to express their voices through storytelling, journalism of art. The goal is to stimulate empathy and alternative views on society and youngsters in vulnerable positions. As a volunteer, your job is to engage with groups belgian youngsters on daily basis, stimulate their participation in this project and co-create a voice-expressing product. You receive freedom in creative expression, following your own and the youngsters artistic or creative preferences. You receive training and coaching in a professional organization with 60 trainers and youth workers.
